We often make plots. 

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )
```

```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y =y)) + 
  geom_point()
```
